snippet.title: Musgro Farm - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2954590?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=MusgroFarm&utm_medium=announcetrailer

Musgro Farm is an upcoming 3D incremental factory game. Fields grow crops, trucks transport them, and buildings combine them into recipes. Every step in the chain has its own incremental upgrades for near-infinite growth, and the various tech trees will allow you to unlock more and more complex systems as you expand your ever-growing farm.

More playtesting and announcements to come, so wishlist and follow to keep in the loop!

Steam:  https://store.steampowered.com/app/2954590?utm_source=YouTube&utm_campaign=MusgroFarm&utm_medium=announcetrailer
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/AutVxXjPn4
Twitter: https://x.com/MetalGamesGG
Press Kit: https://impress.games/press-kit/metal-games-llc/musgro-farm

----------

Music by Arthur Lee Brown: https://linktr.ee/arthurleebrown

#gaming  #indie #factory #automation #steam
